original_text: And God gave Daniel favor and compassion in the sight of the chief of the eunuchs,
korean_text: 하나님이 다니엘로 하여금 환관장에게 은혜와 긍휼을 얻게 하신지라

sentences.original_text: And God gave Daniel favor and compassion
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님께서 다니엘에게 은혜와 긍휼을 베푸셨습니다

sentences.original_text: in the sight of the chief of the eunuchs,
